name: City
description: A major city provides all services imaginable, from luxury goods to specialized crafts, but the dense population creates competition and crime. The wealth and resources attract powerful factions, while the anonymity allows criminals and spies to operate freely.
atmosphere: Vast maze of streets and buildings where every imaginable service and luxury can be found. Air carries complex humanity, commerce, and endless opportunity scent. Streets alive with constant movement of people, carts, and animals. Tall buildings create stone canyons echoing urban life sounds. Dense population provides perfect anonymity for those who seek it. Wealth and resources create opportunity and danger atmosphere. Every district has its own character and secrets.
